Addin.name: MonoDevelop Ide
Addin.author: Todd Berman, Pedro Abelleira Seco, John Luke, Daniel Kornhauser, Alex Graveley, nricciar, John Bou Antoun, Ben Maurer, Jeroen Zwartepoorte, Gustavo Giráldez, Miguel de Icaza, Inigo Illan, Iain McCoy, Nick Drochak, Paweł Różański, Richard Torkar, Paco Martinez, Lluis Sanchez Gual, Christian Hergert, Mike Krueger

ExtensionPoint.name: Platform Service
ExtensionPoint.Description: Implementations of platform-dependent code wrapped in a platform-agnostic API. Specified classes must inherit from MonoDevelop.Ide.Desktop.PlatformService.

ExtensionPoint.name: Stock icons
ExtensionPoint.Description: Available from MonoDevelop.Ide.ImageService

ExtensionPoint.name: Web Browsers
ExtensionPoint.Description: Used optionally to provides a web browser widget. Must implement MonoDevelop.Ide.WebBrowser.IWebBrowserLoader

ExtensionPoint.name: Mime types
ExtensionPoint.Description: Mime type to file extension mappings. Mime types defined here override the ones provided by the operating system.

ExtensionPoint.name: Dialog Handlers
ExtensionPoint.Description: Allows providing platform-specific implementations for common dialogs

ExtensionPoint.name: Dialog panels for item options
ExtensionPoint.Description: Dialog panels for item options. Those panels will be shown for all kind of solution items, solutions and workspaces.

ConditionType.Description: Type of the item. If no namespace is provided, MonoDevelop.Projects is assumed.
Language of the project. It will evaluate to false if the project is not a .NET project.

ExtensionPoint.name: Default policy panels
ExtensionPoint.Description: Panels for editing default policies. Must derive from PolicyOptionsPanel. Should be the same policy panel registered for ItemOptionPanels.

ExtensionPoint.name: Mime Type policy panels
ExtensionPoint.Description: Panels for editing mime type policies. Must derive from MimeTypePolicyOptionsPanel.

ExtensionPoint.name: Display bindings
ExtensionPoint.Description: Display bindings.

ExtensionPoint.name: Startup handlers
ExtensionPoint.Description: Commands to be automatically executed when the IDE starts.

ExtensionPoint.name: User interface commands
ExtensionPoint.Description: User interface commands.

ExtensionPoint.name: Key binding schemes
ExtensionPoint.Description: Key binding schemes.

ExtensionPoint.name: Namespace node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for namespaces in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Method node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for methods in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Field node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for fields in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Event node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for events in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Combine node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for combines in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Class node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for classes in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Property node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for properties in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Project node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for projects in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Reference node context menu in the class pad
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for references in the class pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Project pad context menu
ExtensionPoint.Description: Context menu for nodes in the solution pad.

ConditionType.Description: Type of the item. If no namespace is provided, MonoDevelop.Projects is assumed.

ExtensionPoint.name: Task list views
ExtensionPoint.Description: Task list views to be shown in the task list pad.

ExtensionPoint.name: Workbench pads
ExtensionPoint.Description: Pads shown in the workbench.

ExtensionPoint.name: Workbench contexts
ExtensionPoint.Description: Workbench contexts.

ExtensionPoint.name: Global options panels
ExtensionPoint.Description: Dialog panels for global MonoDevelop options.

ExtensionPoint.name: Combine file filters
ExtensionPoint.Description: File filters to be shown in the Project Open dialog.

ExtensionPoint.name: File filters
ExtensionPoint.Description: File filters to be shown in the File Open dialog.

ExtensionPoint.name: Main toolbar
ExtensionPoint.Description: Main toolbar items.

ExtensionPoint.name: Main menu
ExtensionPoint.Description: Main menu items.

ExtensionPoint.name: File templates
ExtensionPoint.Description: File templates to be shown in the New File dialog.

ExtensionPoint.name: File template types
ExtensionPoint.Description: Template types which can be used to create file templates.

ExtensionPoint.name: File template condition types
ExtensionPoint.Description: Condition types which can be used to limit when file templates can be created.

ExtensionPoint.name: File template types
ExtensionPoint.Description: Project templates to be shown in the New Project dialog.

ExtensionPoint.name: Text editor extensions
ExtensionPoint.Description: Extensions to the text editor. Classes must be a subclass of TextEditorExtension.

ExtensionPoint.name: View Context Menu
ExtensionPoint.Description: The context menu for all open files.

ExtensionPoint.name: View Context Menu
ExtensionPoint.Description: Widgets which allow editing the configuration of execution commands.

ExtensionPoint.name: Code Templates
ExtensionPoint.Description: Custom code templates.

ExtensionPoint.name: Text Editor Resolver
ExtensionPoint.Description: Text editor resolvers are responsible for getting resolve results inside text editor locations.

ExtensionPoint.name: Workbench Layouts
ExtensionPoint.Description: This extension point allows registering layouts and pads to be shown in each layout

ExtensionPoint.name: Custom code generation tools
ExtensionPoint.Description: Extensions to the text editor. Classes must be a subclass of TextEditorExtension.

ExtensionPoint.name: IDE Fonts
ExtensionPoint.Description: Addins can register own fonts to be configured.

ExtensionPoint.name: Updater information
ExtensionPoint.Description: Path of an updateinfo file.

Command._description: Convert the selected text to uppercase
Convert the selected text to lowercase
Join the current line with the next line

Command.description: Count words in a text file

Command._description: Edit the default policies that are applied to new projects
Add the user defined header to the top of the file
Toggles the folding at caret position.
Toggles all the foldings in the document.
Folds all method and property bodies.
Add a new project to the selected solution
Add a new child workspace to the selected workspace
Add a new child solution to the selected workspace
Add a new solution folder to the selected solution
Add a project to the selected solution
Add an existing item to the selected workspace
Remove an item from the project
Add existing files to the project
Adds files from a folder recursively
Adds and existing folder and its contents
Add existing file to the project
Build all projects of all solutions
Rebuild all projects of all solutions
Clean the selected project or solution
Clean all projects of all solutions
Copy the assembly to the output directory when building the project
Stop current build or application execution
Convert selected project or solution to another format
Close all solutions open in the current workspace
Close the active solution or workspace item
Revert to a saved version of the file
Save the current file with a different name
Opens a terminal in this folder
Opens the folder in a file manager.
Opens the folder that contains this file.
Closes all opened files except for the active file
Copy the file path to the clipboard

Command._label: List of programs to open with

Command._description: Move cursor to next error or search match
Move cursor to previous error or search match
Move to previous point in code navigation history
Move to next point in code navigation history
Select a point from the navigation history
Check for updates to MonoDevelop and packages it requires
Search forwards for the same text
Search backwards for the same text
Search forwards for the same text with emacs behavior
Search backwards for the same text with emacs behavior
Search forwards for the selected text
Search backwards for the selected text
Search for text in all files of a directory
Search for and replace text in all files of a directory
Jump to the declaration of type in the current workspace
Jump to a file in the current workspace
Jump to a item in the current workspace
Uses the current selection as find string
Uses the current selection as replace string
Deletes to end of line, or if at end, deletes line ending

Command._label: Move the line or highlighted selection up
Move the line or highlighted selection down

Command.description: Switch between insert and overwrite caret modes

Command._label: Insert line break after the caret
Move caret to EOL and insert new line

Command._description: Swaps the characters on either side of the caret
Scrolls the editor so that the caret is centered

PadOption._label: Show public and protected members only

ItemSet._description: Select a point from the navigation history

LinkItem.description: A free .NET implementation effort, worth visiting
Download and share sample applications, code snippets, and other resources with the developer community.
